channel.title: Hexo on GK's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hexo on GK's Blog

item.title: Blog is now powered by Hexo
item.description: I’ve been using gatsbyjs and faced a lot of issues on user defined components. Adding asciinema never worked. It took me days to cleanly render my Terminal component. Most of the pluggins were still under development. Rendering a pdf was really a nightmare which at last was successful but not in a clear way. The gatsby pdf has never been started. The themes were lacking. The RSS plugin didn’t work at all.
